# OMS Application - Copilot Instructions

This is a comprehensive Order Management System (OMS) application with the following features:

## Core Features

- Order Processing: Sales orders, purchase orders, invoicing, production tracking
- Client Tools: Online shops, portals, order status tracking, proofs
- Supplier Management: Integration with ESP, SAGE, Distributor Central
- CRM Integration: HubSpot and possible ZoomInfo/Apollo
- Slack Integration: Automated updates and team alerts
- AI Knowledge Base
- Reporting & Analytics: Real-time dashboards and custom reports
- Automation: Automate confirmations, approvals, and workflow triggers
- Financial Tools: Stripe and QuickBooks integration
- Security: Role-based dashboards and access controls

## Technology Stack

- Frontend: Next.js with TypeScript and Tailwind CSS
- Backend: Node.js with Express and TypeScript
- Database: PostgreSQL with Prisma ORM
- Authentication: JWT with role-based access control
- Real-time: WebSocket support for live updates
- Integrations: REST APIs for third-party services
- Deployment: Docker containers

## Project Structure

- `/frontend` - Next.js application
- `/backend` - Express API server
- `/shared` - Shared types and utilities
- `/docs` - Documentation
- `/docker` - Docker configurations
